00000000100000000000000010010011 //addi x1 x0 8  //Reg[x1] = 8
00000001000000000000000100010011 //addi x2 x0 16 //Reg[x2] = 16
00000000001000001000000110110011 //add x3 x1 x2  //Reg[x3] = 24
01000000001000001000001000110011 //sub x4 x1 x2  //Reg[x4] = Reg[x2] - Reg[x1] = 8
00000000010000001000001010110011 //add x5 x1 x4  //Reg[x5] = 16
00000000001000101000010001100011 //beq x5 x2 8 //PC = PC + 8 if Reg[x5] = Reg[x2]
00000000000000000000000000110011 // add x0 x0 x0
00000000000000000000001010110011 // add x5 x0 x0 Reg[x5] = 0
00000000000000101000001101100111 // jalr x6 x5 0 Pc = Reg[x5] + 0, Reg[x6] = Pc + 4
00000000010000101010001100000011 //lw x6 x5 4 // Reg[x6] = Mem[Reg[x5]+4]
00000000010100110010010000100011 //sw x6 x5 8 // Mem[Reg[x5]+8] = Reg[x6]
